The unive_____ has a famous sch___ of ar__ and des___. Attending the school will connect her to many distinguished graduates in her field.
data.fullContent: Next term, Siobhan is going to study at the University of Dundee. She plans to become a graphic designer when she has completed her degree. The university has a famous school of arts and design. Attending the school will connect her to many distinguished graduates in her field.
data.answer: 下个学期，Siobhan将去邓迪大学学习。她计划在完成学位后成为一名平面设计师。这所大学有一个著名的艺术和设计学院。参加这所学校将使她与她所在领域的许多杰出毕业生联系在一起。
